products.title: Baby Barrier Cream Trio
products.body_html:
We’ve bundled this organic best seller so you can save while you stock up on your baby favourites. Made with beeswax and chamomile, this protective cream is loved by us and by you for helping to keep baby’s skin soft and comfortable. What's more, this clever little bundle of joy gives you three products for the price of two.

Help keep baby's skin soft and comfortable with this cream. Made with nourishing organic beeswax and organic chamomile, it is suitable for baby’s delicate skin.

  • Helps keep baby's skin soft and comfortable
  • Hypoallergenic and Dermatologically Tested
  • Gentle enough for newborns 3kg/6lb 10oz and over

products.title: Special Offer: Organic Travel Kit
products.body_html:
This kit brings together five of our bestselling certified organic skin, bath and body products in convenient travel sizes.

Made with essential oil blends and natural ingredients to cleanse, nourish and protect the skin, these washbag essentials are perfect for using on the go and refilling again and again. What’s more, they’re housed in our branded, 100% organic cotton cosmetic pouch.

• For all skin types
• Certified organic
• Contains five bestselling skin, bath and body products
• Comes with our branded 100% organic cotton cosmetic pouch

Inside your Organic Travel Kit:

Wild Rose Beauty Balm (15g)
An intensely nourishing one-pot wonder balm for visibly enhanced radiance.

Rejuvenating Frankincense Hydrating Cream (15g)
Made with nourishing plant oils to intensively moisturise skin for up to 24 hours.

Geranium & Orange Shower Gel (50ml)
Gently cleanse and revive skin with this energising, beautifully fragrant shower gel.

Bee Lovely Hand Cream (30ml)
Naturally nourishing hand cream for soft and beautifully scented hands.

Organic Defence Hand Spray (50ml)
Keep hands clean with a delicately fragranced hand spray that kills 99.9% of bacteria.

products.title: 12 Days of Beauty & Wellbeing Advent Calendar 2023
Stellaria Cream 30ml
products.body_html:
A cooling and soothing cream, for dry and sensitive skin, for all the family. This soothing cream contains 10% organic stellaria (chickweed) tincture in a gentle ointment base.

Benefits:

  • Soothing for dry, itching or sensitive skin
  • Fresh organic plant extracts
  • Ideal for family use

products.title: Lavender & Tea Tree Body Powder 100g
products.body_html:
Stay fresh with our talc-free Lavender & Tea Tree Body Powder. Made with purifying tea tree, calming lavender and organic corn starch, it helps keep skin comfortably soft – perfect for use after sports.

  • Refreshes and softens skin
  • With purifying tea tree, calming lavender and organic corn starch
  • Certified organic by the Soil Association
  • Talc-free
  • Perfect for use after sports

products.title: Geranium & Orange Shower Gel : 300ml
products.body_html:
This energising natural shower gel gently cleanses your skin to leave it feeling fresh and fragrant. With soothing calendula extract, an uplifting blend of balancing Congolese geranium and energising Italian orange essential oils, it’s the perfect start to your day.

Revives and revitalises
Skin-conditioning calendula moisturises and soothes
Combines an uplifting blend of aromatherapy essential oils

products.title: Aromatic Shower Gel : 300ml
products.body_html:
Enjoy the soothing blend of balancing organic geranium and relaxing lavender essential oils in this naturally aromatic, subtly floral, skin-conditioning shower gel.

  • Cleanses and conditions with aloe vera
  • Naturally soothing, subtly floral, aroma
  • With balancing organic geranium and relaxing organic lavender essential oils
  • Certified COSMOS Organic by the Soil Association

products.title: Replacement Reeds for Reed Diffuser
products.body_html:
Replacement rattan reeds, ideal to use to refresh a 100ml reed diffuser. Simply add to your chosen diffuser, and let the oils absorb through the natural reeds, leaving your space beautifully scented for an enhanced sense of wellbeing.

  • Eight natural reeds per bundle
  • 200mm in length
  • Gently releases a long-lasting aroma
  • Safe and easy to use

products.title: Citrus Hand Lotion Refill 200ml
products.body_html:
Our organic, lightweight lotion nourishes and revitalises hardworking hands. A moisturising blend of organic almond and apricot oil smooths and softens skin while the fresh zesty scent of lemon, orange and grapefruit essential oils stimulate the senses.

  • Conditions and freshens
  • No pump to reduce plastic waste
  • Certified organic and Vegan Approved

Works well with:

  • Citrus Hand Wash – No Pump

REDUCING PLASTIC WASTE
We’re always working on ways to make our packaging more environmentally friendly. This product is being sold as a refill without a pump to encourage customers to keep washing and reusing their old pumps. If you require a new pump at any time, these can be purchased on our website.

IMPORTANT: Replace the screw cap on your new bottle with your clean, old pump. Then place the screw cap on your old bottle and recycle with glass in your kerbside recycling.

products.body_html:

products.title: Women’s Balance Balm 170g
products.body_html:
Clinically proven to reduce the appearance of all types of stretchmarks, from growth spurts to weight fluctuations, this luxurious aromatherapeutic balm works to boost your skin’s firmness and elasticity. Expertly formulated with moisturising organic oils, omega-rich sweet almond oil, smoothing macadamia oil and beeswax, it’ll leave your skin feeling soft and supple.

Relaxing patchouli, uplifting geranium, nurturing rose and rejuvenating frankincense work together to relax your mind, while macadamia and sweet almond oils intensely nourish your skin.

· Clinically proven to reduce the appearance of stretch marks

· Boosts skin’s firmness and elasticity

· Intensely nourishes with macadamia and sweet almond oils

· Calms the mind with rose and frankincense

· Certified COSMOS natural

Complementary products:

· Women’s Balance Foaming Bath

· Women’s Balance Shower Oil

· Women’s Balance Massage Oil

· Women’s Balance Body Cream

· Women’s Balance Aromatherapy Blend

products.title: Wild Rose Body Lotion 100ml
products.body_html:
Our certified organic Wild Rose Body Lotion beautifully moisturises for enhanced radiance. This easily absorbed body lotion is formulated with organic wild rosehip seed oil and sweet almond oil to intensely nourish the skin, leaving it feeling soft and smooth.

  • Beautifully moisturises for enhanced radiance
  • Leaves skin soft and smooth
  • Certified organic

Zartasha, consumer trial participant for Wild Rose Body Lotion.

products.title: Heritage Beauty & Wellbeing Box
products.body_html:
Our naturally uplifting and carefully curated Heritage Beauty & Wellbeing Box has everything you need to look good and feel good this summer. Crafted with homegrown natural and organic ingredients and packed with floral, sun-filled scents to relax and inspire, these most-loved summer favourites will bring the sunshine whatever the weather.

 · Limited edition

· Two full-size products

· Natural & organic wellbeing

· Ethically & sustainably sourced ingredients

· Suitable for vegetarians

 The Heritage Beauty & Wellbeing Box contains:

Wild Rose Beauty Balm (15g): An intensely nourishing one pot wonder balm for visibly enhanced radiance.

Relaxation Remedies to Roll (9ml): A delicately blended, comforting aroma to encourage relaxation.

Geranium & Orange Hand Cream (30ml): Nourishes and uplifts with organic geranium and orange essential oils.

Aromatic Foaming Bath (100ml): Help relax body and mind with a soothing blend of aromatherapeutic essential oils.

Geranium & Orange Shower Gel (200ml): Cleanses and uplifts with organic geranium and orange essential oils.

Aromatic Body Butter (50g): With organic shea and coconut butters and a soothing blend of essential oils for deeply nourished skin.

Lavender Organic Essential Oil (10ml): Naturally soothing, this fragrant organic essential oil is calming for your mind, body and wellbeing.

products.title: Organic Rosehip Oil 25ml
products.body_html:
Nurture your skin’s natural radiance with restorative organic rosehip oil. This gentle face oil is proven to moisturise the skin while helping to reduce the appearance of hyperpigmentation over time. Our organic rosehip oil, already naturally vitamin-rich, is expertly paired with additional antioxidant vitamin E to deliver a boost for the skin that both protects and quenches.

Rosehip oil is rich in essential fatty acids that work to moisturise and protect the skin barrier. Its high concentration of A, B and E vitamins make rosehip oil a proven, natural remedy for dull or pigmented skin.

Vitamin E brings enhanced antioxidant-rich benefits for the skin while protecting the rosehip oil from oxidising, meaning it lasts longer.

  • Enhances natural radiance
  • Helps to reduce hyperpigmentation over time
  • With antioxidant-rich vitamin E for added protection
  • Certified organic

PROOF ORGANIC WORKS

Proven to restore skin’s natural radiance with just a few drops.

Up to 250 uses*

Instantly**

82% agree skin is instantly hydrated

After 4 weeks** 

88% agree natural radiance is enhanced

88% agree skin is left feeling deeply nourished

70% agree the appearance of hyperpigmentation is reduced over time

* Based on 1-2 drops per application

** Based on a consumer trial with 72 women using the product two times per day

 

Suitable for vegans

DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED

Patch-tested on sensitive skin & suitable for all skin types.

products.title: Vitamin C Brightening Booster 25ml
products.body_html:
Supercharge your skin’s natural radiance with brightening vitamin C. Crafted to complement any skin type or routine, this high-performing booster illuminates the complexion and helps to even skin tone, leaving it glowing and restored. Our vitamin C formula is expertly blended with Kakadu plum and ultra-hydrating hyaluronic acid for enhanced benefits.

Vitamin C is a powerful antioxidant proven to brighten the skin instantly and target tired, dull complexions while helping to even skin tone and improve hyperpigmentation over time.

Kakadu plum is the world’s most potent source of vitamin C, containing almost 100 times more vitamin C than oranges. Also an antioxidant, Kakadu plum enhances this booster’s radiance-giving benefits and supports the penetration of vitamin C into the skin.

Hyaluronic acid brings added hydration and helps to lock in moisture for soft, supple skin.

  • Illuminates dull skin
  • Helps to even skin tone
  • With added vitamin C-rich Kakadu plum
  • Certified organic

PROOF ORGANIC WORKS

Proven to boost skin’s natural glow with just a few drops.

Up to 125 uses*

After 4 weeks**

84% agree skin is visibly brighter

82% agree dull skin is illuminated

75% agree skin tone is more even 

* Based on 1-2 drops per application

** Based on a consumer trial with 72 women using the product two times per day

Suitable for vegans

DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED

Patch-tested on sensitive skin & suitable for all skin types.

products.title: Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Booster 25ml
products.body_html:
Boost your skin’s natural beauty with ultra-hydrating hyaluronic acid. Carefully formulated to adapt to any skin type or routine, this tried-and-tested booster targets dehydrated skin and fine lines and wrinkles with an expert pairing of two key active ingredients; hyaluronic acid and hibiscus extract.

Hyaluronic acid attracts and holds onto moisture, giving skin an instant, intense dose of hydration. Dehydrated skin is left dewy, supple and visibly plumped, while skin texture is improved, and the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles is reduced.

Hibiscus extract further enhances this booster’s deeply hydrating properties, selected for its instant and long-term support of the skin’s natural ability to retain moisture.

· Instantly hydrates skin

· Skin feels plumped

· With added hibiscus extract for enhanced moisturisation

· Certified organic

PROOF ORGANIC WORKS

Proven to intensely hydrate skin with just a few drops.

Up to 125 uses*

Instantly**

98% agree their skin is instantly hydrated

91% agree their skin feels plumped

After 12 hours**

86% agree skin feels hydrated

After 4 weeks**

97% agree their skin is intensely hydrated

87% agree their skin texture is improved

* Based on 1-2 drops per application

** Based on a consumer trial with 72 women using the product two times per day

Suitable for vegans

DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED

Patch-tested on sensitive skin & suitable for all skin types.

products.title: Rejuvenating Frankincense Nourishing Cream + Organic Beauty Oil
products.body_html:
This duo is packed with rejuvenating ingredients that support the skin’s natural beauty. Calming frankincense enriches this nourishing day cream while the high content of omega-3 of our organic beauty oil boosts skin, hair and nails from within.

Rejuvenating Frankincense Nourishing Cream - 50g

Extra rich in texture and providing up to 24 hours moisturisation, this best-selling cream is perfect to help rebalance dry, more mature skin for a healthier complexion. Packed full of nourishing plant oils and nutrient-rich herbal extracts, skin will feel soft, replenished and smooth.

• Clinically proven to provide up to 24 hours moisturisation
• Ideal for dry or more mature skin
• Dermatologically tested
• Vegan approved

Organic Beauty Oil - 200ml

This certified organic and vegan approved food supplement is rich in omega-3 with omegas 6&9. Made with a blend of organic flax seed, hemp, avocado, evening primrose and pumpkin seed oils for beautiful looking skin, hair and nails.
• For beautiful looking skin, hair and nails
• High in omega-3
• Certified organic and vegan approved

products.title: Frankincense Intense™ Age-Defying Overnight Mask + Beauty Boost Supplement
products.body_html:
Create a skin-boosting frankincense-infused ritual for night and day with our Frankincense Intense™ mask, proven to visibly firm and lift the skin overnight, and vitamin-C packed Beauty Boost Supplement.

Frankincense Intense™ Age-Defying Overnight Mask - 50g
Elevate your skincare routine with our clinically proven and certified organic age-defying mask. This luxurious overnight mask with Bacillus Ferment visibly firms and recontours as it evens skin tone. Glycogen and hyaluronic acid boost hydration to instantly smooth and plump while botanical adaptogens, Ashwaghanda extract, Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) oil and Turmeric Root extract support the skin for a more rested and radiant complexion. Over time, cheeks and jawline are redefined, and skin is left visibly restored with deep lines and wrinkles reduced.

Visibly firms & recontours: Bacillus Ferment helps to firm, lift and recontour, while glycogen and hyaluronic acid boost hydration to instantly smooth and plump, leaving skin revitalised and the cheeks and jawline redefined.

Restores: Botanical adaptogens Ashwaghanda extract, Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) oil and Tumeric Root extract support the skin for a more rested and radiant complexion.

Enhances wellbeing: Soothes your senses with Boswellia sacra (frankincense) essential oil, traditionally used for its deeply relaxing aroma.
• Instant boost or overnight treatment
• Clinically proven to firm, lift and recontour skin**
• Certified organic and Vegan Approved

PROOF ORGANIC WORKS
Clinically proven to firm, lift and recontour skin, as well as reduce the appearance of deep lines and wrinkles after 28 days, when used 3 times per week.

Instantly*
70% agree their skin feels firmer
84% agree their skin feels replenished
86% agree their skin is visibly smoother

After 2 weeks**
76% agree their skin feels tighter
77% agree their skin is visibly lifted
80% agree their complexion is more even

After 6 weeks **
70% agree their cheeks and jawline are visibly recontoured
71% agree their facial contours are lifted
73% agree their deep lines and wrinkles are reduced

*Based on a consumer trial with 102 women used as a 30-minute treatment
** Based on a consumer trial with 100 women used as an overnight treatment, 3 times per week

DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED

Frankincense Intense™ Beauty Boost Supplement – 60 capsules

• Biotin contributes to the maintenance of normal skin and mucous membranes
• Vitamin C and Selenium contributes to the protection of cells from oxidative stress
• Vitamin C contributes to normal collagen formation for the normal function of skin
• Zinc contributes to the maintenance of normal skin, hair and nails
• Copper contributes to normal skin pigmentation
• Selenium contributes to the maintenance of normal hair and nails
• Free from fillers and binders
• Suitable for vegetarians and vegans

products.title: Reviving White Tea Facial Mask + Super Antioxidant Boost Supplement
products.body_html:
Harness the benefits of antioxidant-rich ingredients. Our reviving white tea mask counteracts daily skin stressors such as pollution, while inner wellbeing is supported naturally by this antioxidant-packed supplement.

Reviving White Tea Facial Mask – 50g

Suitable for all skin types, this award-winning detoxifying face mask cleanses and nurtures skin. With antioxidant-rich white tea to help counteract the effects of pollutants and detoxifying kaolin clay to draw out impurities, use as a weekly treat for skin that feels cleansed and revived.
• For all skin types
• Gently detoxifying and cleansing
• With antioxidant-rich white tea

Super Antioxidant Boost – 60 capsules

Age well from within and support your body's antioxidant levels to help protect it against the damaging, ageing effects of environmental and emotional aggressors, such as pollution and stress.
With an antioxidant-rich blend of grape seed, pine bark and olive leaf, with vitamin C to help protect cells against oxidative stress, and vitamins D and C, and minerals zinc and selenium to help maintain the normal function of the immune system. It's the ideal daily addition to your holistic health and general wellbeing to support your beauty from the inside out.

Benefits:

• Helps support your body, skin and natural health from within
• With grape seed, pine bark and olive leaf, with vitamin C to help protect cells against oxidative stress
• Vitamins C and D, and minerals zinc and selenium, to help maintain the normal function of the immune system
• Zinc and vitamin C contribute to the maintenance of normal hair, skin and nails
• Synergistic blend of vitamins and phytonutrients
• Non-GM
• No nano technology
• Vegetarian

products.title: Sensitive Cleansing Milk + Dandelion & Burdock Formula
products.body_html:
A gentle duo featuring our cooling, fragrance-free cleansing milk, formulated to sooth easily irritated sensitive skin, and our dandelion and burdock herbal blend, traditionally used to support the body’s natural cleansing processes.

Sensitive Cleansing Milk -185ml

Effectively cleanses, calms and cools irritated sensitive skin
Gentle yet effective, this certified organic fragrance-free cleansing milk cools and soothes sensitive skin as it melts away everyday impurities without stripping, for a deeply calming cleanse. Expertly formulated with powerful natural botanicals to comfort and soothe reactive skin, organic borage oil calms and hydrates, while organic aloe vera cools and moisturises. Sensitive skin is left cleansed, calmed and cooled.

Calms

Organic borage oil and liquorice root extract soothe and condition sensitive skin, while antioxidant organic edelweiss extract helps to support the skin’s natural barrier.

Cools

Organic aloe vera comforts and cools irritated skin instantly, providing a moisture boost to soothe and refresh.
Sensitive Skin Solutions
• Effectively cleanses, calms and cools sensitive skin
• Fragrance and alcohol-free
• Dermatologically tested
• Certified organic
• Vegan approved

Dandelion & Burdock Formula 100ml

A herbal blend, traditionally used to support the body’s natural cleansing processes.

For precautions and how to use dispensed herbal products, click here

products.title: Wild Rose Day Cream + Vitamin C Boost Supplement
products.body_html:
A harmonious duo that works to contribute a sense of radiance to your daily routine. Our lightweight day cream with organic wild rosehip seed oil leaves skin glowing, while inner health is boosted daily by vitamin C.

Wild Rose Glow Day Cream 50ml

Instantly hydrate and revitalise your skin with our certified organic and clinically proven day cream. This lightweight moisturiser with organic wild rosehip seed oil visibly enhances radiance day after day. Enriched with hyaluronic acid to lock in moisture and instantly smooth and plump, and naturally derived olive leaf extracts to revitalise dull skin. Organic grapeseed oil and plant-derived fatty acids condition and moisturise, while organic wild rosehip seed oil boosts radiance. Skin is left soft and supple with a healthy glow.

Enhances radiance

Enjoy radiant skin with the glow-giving properties of organic wild rosehip seed oil.

Hydrates and revitalises

Enriched with hyaluronic acid to lock in moisture and instantly smooth and plump while naturally derived olive leaf extracts and organic cocoa butter revitalise tired looking skin.

Softens and smooths

Organic grapeseed oil and plant-derived fatty acids condition and moisturise for a soft, smooth complexion.

PROOF ORGANIC WORKS

Clinically proven to moisturise skin for up to 12 hours.

Instantly*

  • 80% agree their skin feels revitalised

  • 92% agree their skin feels hydrated

After two weeks*

products.title: Organic Cotton Tote Bag
products.body_html: Our stylish and practical navy tote bag is made with 100% organic cotton and dyed using water-based inks. Organic cotton is grown without the use of chemical pesticides, protecting bees and other pollinators from harm. The cotton we use is grown by small-scale farmers in India and is certified by the Soil Association to the Global Organic Textile Standards. <br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">• Made with 100% organic cotton <br data-mce-fragment="1">• Durable, reusable and washable (see Directions)<br data-mce-fragment="1">• Dyed using water-based inks<br data-mce-fragment="1">• Dimensions: (h) 41cm x (w) 37cm x (d) 10cm

This skin-nourishing hand cream is enriched with glow-giving organic wild rosehip oil and scented with a balancing blend of organic geranium and patchouli essential oils.  Hands and nails are left feeling soft and smelling divine.

products.body_html: Our high potency blend of naturally occurring live bacteria and inulin to support gut health.<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">• Contains naturally occurring live bacteria in a highly stable and durable form, resistant to stomach acid and bile salts<br data-mce-fragment="1">• Contains inulin to support the natural growth of beneficial bacteria in the gut<br data-mce-fragment="1">• No refrigeration required<br data-mce-fragment="1">• Free from wheat, gluten and lactose<br data-mce-fragment="1">• No binders or fillers<br data-mce-fragment="1">• Suitable for vegans<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">

products.title: Reviving Shower Scents Collection
products.body_html:
Enjoy blissfully clean, soft skin with our reviving collection of shower gels. Whether it’s to uplift, relax or soothe, savour the evocative aromas of sustainably sourced, pure organic essential oils.

 · For blissfully clean, soft skin

· Certified organic

· Suitable for vegans 

Gift contains:

· Geranium & Orange Shower Gel 100ml: with soothing organic calendula extract and an infusion of reviving organic essential oils to lift your day. Made with organic orange essential oil, sustainably sourced from the orchards of southerly Calabria and Sicily.

· English Lavender Bath & Shower Gel 100ml: calming English lavender combines with soothing extracts of chamomile and oat to relax your mind and bring a sense of enhanced wellbeing. Made with organic English lavender essential oil, sourced and distilled at a family farm in the rolling Hampshire countryside.

· Aromatic Shower Gel 100ml: skin-conditioning aloe vera and a soothing blend of organic essential oils combine for a naturally aromatic, subtly floral cleanse. Made with organic geranium leaves and flowers, handpicked at a Fair for Life certified plantation in the Democratic Republic of Congo.

products.title: Restoring Bath Scents Collection
products.body_html:
Immerse yourself in the evocative aromas of pure essential oils with our fragrant collection of foaming baths. Restore and revive your senses as you take time to sink in, unwind and relax for a luxurious soak. 

  • Restores and revives
  • Made with natural and organic ingredients
  • Suitable for vegetarians

Gift contains:

  • Seaweed & Arnica Foaming Bath 100ml: with a revitalising mix of organic seaweed and pure essential oils, to help restore a sense of vitality. Made with organic Bladderwrack seaweed, wild-harvested from the Western Isles of Scotland and Connemara, Ireland.
  • Aromatic Foaming Bath 100ml: infused with a soothing blend of organic lavender, geranium and Spanish marjoram essential oils to unwind the body and mind. Made with organic geranium leaves and flowers, handpicked at a Fair for Life certified plantation in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
  • Beauty Sleep Foaming Bath 100ml: perfectly prepare for bed with a calming blend of ylang ylang, patchouli and clary sage essential oils to ease you into a peaceful sleep. Made with organic ylang ylang, handpicked in the Ambanja region of Madagascar as part of a fair trade project.

products.title: Bee Lovely Nourishing Trio
products.body_html:
With moisturising organic beewax to nourish the skin and energising orange essential oil to lift the spirits, this bee-utiful trio of Bee Lovely favourites will leave lips silky smooth and skin velvety soft from top-to-toe.

 You’re helping to save the bees too, as 3% of sales from our Bee Lovely range goes to charities that help protect bees.

 Made with organic fair trade honey, sourced through an ethical co-operative in Chiapas, southern Mexico.

  • Naturally nourishing for silky-soft skin
  • 3% of sales goes to bee-friendly charities
  • Certified organic
  • Suitable for vegetarians

Gift contains:

  • Bee Lovely Hand Cream 30ml: naturally moisturising for beautifully scented, soft hands.
  • Bee Lovely Body Lotion 50ml: made with moisturising organic honey and uplifting orange essential oil to condition the skin and lift the spirits.
  • Bee Lovely Beautiful Lips 15g: a nourishing balm for beautifully soft lips, scented with uplifting organic orange essential oil.
